description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Kerberos security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-21427), apply the recommended updates as listed below:

1. Identify the appropriate KB Article based on your system version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5035853
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: KB5035853
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: KB5035854
   - For Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: KB5035858
   - For Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems: KB5035858
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5035845
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5035845

2. Download and install the update packages from the official Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854)
   - [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
   - [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)

**Details**:
- This update addresses the security feature bypass vulnerability affecting Windows Kerberos, which could be exploited to gain unauthorized access to security features.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is compatible with the respective Windows version.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
